mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM(ACCOUNT_ID, STORE_ID, TABLE_ID, ORDER_TIME, PAYMENT_TIME, RESERVATION_TIME, IS_SERVED, IS_RESERVATION, RESERVATION_DENY_DETAIL) VALUES (#{accountId}, #{storeId}, #{tableId}, #{orderTime}, #{paymentTime}, #{reservationTime}, #{isServed}, #{isReservation}, #{reservationDenyDetail})
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDER_ITEM SET (TABLE_ID, ORDER_TIME, PAYMENT_TIME, RESERVATION_TIME, IS_SERVED) = (#{tableId}, #{orderTime}, #{paymentTime}, #{reservationTime}, #{isServed}) WHERE ID = #{id}
